title: GET_PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA
content:
0xD014AB79// GetPlayerMaxStamina
float GET_PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA(Player playerId);Parameters:playerId: The player index.Returns: The value of player max stamina.
codeBlocks:
local player = PlayerId()
-- Example usage for GET_PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA
GetPlayerMaxStamina(player)
